body.name: Selfie Stick, 41'' Extendable Phone Tripod Stand with Phone Holder & Detachable Remote, 360° Rotation Selfie Stick Tripod for Cell Phone Compatible with iPhone, Android, Samsung
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 4 mins
features: 【All-in-One Selfie Stick】 Bringing this selfie stick on your trip means you own a selfie stick, a phone tripod, and a tabletop phone stand, all in one device. Use it as a regular selfie stick or as a quick and easy tripod for stable shots. And it with detachable and extendable phone clip, compatible with most smart phones within 2.5-3.7 inch (65-95mm). It can be detached to used as a tabletop cell phone stand after, making it convenient for you to watch videos, TV show and make video calls.

【41" Extendable Selfie Stick】 With 7-section adjustable telescopic poles, the phone selfie stick tripod stand is long, can be adjusted from 7.7 in (19.6cm) to 41.7 in (106cm), can capture a wider landscape, easy to photograph the whole body instead of the part. In normal conditions on a flat surface, The shorter it is extended, the more stable it will be. It great for Selfies, Group Photos, Face-time, Life-Vlog, Video shooting, Social life.

【Adjustable Angle and Rotatable Phone Holder】 Cell phone tripod adopts a 360° rota-table mobile phone clip and a 225° elevated and overhead shots design to help you quickly find the best shooting angle to get the composition is more diversified, allow you could take photos, video call or live broadcasting. The phone clip is equipped with soft silicone and protect your phone or devices from scratches or falls down. Suitable for family gatherings and friends reunions, trips, etc.

【Detachable Remote Shutter】 Cell phone tripod with built-in wireless remote control, support shooting within 30 feet (10 meters), compatible with IOS/Android, very easy to operate, no need to use APP. You can easily press the button to shoot, is excellent for snapping selfies or group photos from afar. And it has a detachable design when the remote control is not in use, it can be put into the special remote control slot on the handle of the selfie stick for phone to prevent it from being lost.

【Lightweight & Portable】 Selfie stick thanks to the hidden retractable design, when folded up size 7.7 inch (19.6 cm), weigh 5.5 oz (156g), it can be easily packed in your bag, backpack or suitcase without taking up more space. The phone tripod stand is easy to carry nice, which is great for traveling, hiking, camping. Whenever you want to capture a beautiful moment, it's right there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the right size
reviews.reviewText: I had a friend tell me that the 2000s called and wanted their selfie stick back. I laughed in his face as I was one of the people that thought they were gimmicky. I was wrong. The days of stretching my arm out as far as I can and hoping I don't drop my phone while I try to hit the button are over. The handle turns into a base and stretches out to a sort of mic stand. It is more stable than you would expect, though it only needs to hole a phone. If you spend money on many gadgets, this one will be one of the more useful purchases you will make.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact for on the go use
reviews.reviewText: My wife always had to engineer (i.e. McGyver) her phone for our family photos at family gatherings. Now this handy, compact unit let's her have a true tripod for these memory capturing opportunities. Plus there is a remote that allows for hands free picture taking, but with smart phones/ watches that's not a huge factor. Tripod is stable enough but is prone to tipping, swaying in the breeze BUT with a little planning serves the purpose intended. Selfie stick comes in handy as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's great!!! Just what I wanted!
reviews.reviewText: It's great for the price! I am going to use it to record with my phone, my archery shots!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this unit because the switch for taking photos is secure on the device thereby reducing chance for damage such as key chain models.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Selfie cell phone stick
reviews.reviewText: This is a very handy item to use for my grandbaby while we are riding in the car as passengers. He doesn't get too bored as I play videos or cartoons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Broke on second use, refund given
reviews.reviewText: When I got it, I tested it out and it seemed great for the money. Second time I used it, though, it tipped over and broke the piece that holds the phone. So now it’s just a stick.--Update--The company has given me a full refund, and for that customer service experience alone I'm updating my rating to 4 stars. Why? Because as I said, it's a great product for the money - just be careful with it and you might never have issues. And the fact that they listen to the their customers is huge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was pretty flimsy, returning. Scared my phone would fall and break.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Small, sleek and so easy to use and maneuver.
Molto funzionale. poco stabile se usato come cavalletto
davvero comodo , facile da associare x le foto a distanza davvero consigliato

Tempo di consegna e imballaggio ottimi. È segnalata, perfino, la presenza di una batteria (del telecomando?) di scorta.L’apertura e l’utilizzo del dispositivo, (seguendo le “foto istruzioni), è facile.Un dubbio sorge nelle istruzioni, quando viene trattato il montaggio dell’inesistente, nella confezione, “fill light” (lampada di riempimento) perché non c’è ma non è nominata nell’offerta. Prodotto ottimo se non si ha la pretesa di avere un cavalletto stabile adatto a dispositivi pesanti e grandi.

reviews.reviewTitle: Materiale solido, oltre a essere un asta per selfie diventa anche un supporto tavolo
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. La confezione contiene , le istruzioni in italiano con figure, un cavetto per caricare la luce che ha varie intensità come descritto dal venditore, una batteria di scorta per il telecomando Bluetooth, che si associa in un attimo . Mi piace il fatto che il telefono si può sfilare dall'asta per rispondere agevolmente alle chiamate e poi dietro come si vede in foto ha una linguetta che se spostata , diventa un supporto per telefono da tavolo, per vedere comodamente foto, video ecc oppure fare foto senza il treppiede ed è questa possibilità che mi ha fatto decidere di acquistare questa asta per selfie Qirita. Blocca in maniera solida il mio smartphone è di 6.5" quello in foto è un 5.5" . L'unica pecca ed è per questo che non ho dato 5 stelle è la stabilità con tutta l'asta aperta oscilla e se non è in piano o magari tira vento il cellulare è a rischio cadute .
